content.text: The Aggoron were a sentient species. Many Aggorons were traders, and—along with Devaronians, Humans, Nalroni, and Squibs—they formed part of the thousands of non-Gree who lived in Satikan, the largest city on Asation, which was the main trading post and access system to the Gree Enclave.

The Aggoron were created by Timothy O'Brien for his article "The Gree Enclave," which was published in Star Wars Adventure Journal 8 in 1995. This article was later republished in Classic Adventures: Volume Four - The Best of the Journal in 1997.

elements.text: Classic Adventures: Volume Four - The Best of the Journal
